    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:e8c9416a-b042-4e75-a5bd-cae3e2181330</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>e8c9416a-b042-4e75-a5bd-cae3e2181330</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A hormonális rendszer</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Hormone System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Hormon-System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Système d'Hormone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Sistema Do Hormone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Sistema Dell'Ormone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σύστημα ορμονών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Sistema De la Hormona</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A belső elválasztású mirigyek (agyalapi mirigy, pajzsmirigy, mellékpajzsmirigy, mellékvese, hasnyálmirigy, ivarmirigyek) hormontermelése; a legfontosabb hormonok hatása</string>
            <string language="en-US">Hormone Generation of Endocrine Glands (Pituitary Gland, Thyroid, Parathyroid, Renal Gland, Pancreas, Gonads); the Effect of the Most Important Hormones</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">egészséges életmódra nevelés</string>
            <string language="en-US">healhty lifestyle education</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hormon-Erzeugung der endokriner Drüsen 
(pituitäre Drüse, Schilddrüse, Paraschilddrüse, Nierendrüse, 
Pankreas, Gonaden); der Effekt der wichtigsten Hormone</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Génération d'hormone des glandes Endocriniennes
(glande pituitaire, thyroïde, parathyroïde, glande rénale, 
pancréas, gonades) ; l'effet des hormones les plus importantes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geração do hormone das glândulas de endocrine 
(glândula pituitary, thyroid, parathyroid, glândula renal, pancreas,
gonads); o efeito dos hormones os mais importantes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Generazione dell'ormone delle ghiandole endocrine
(ghiandola pituitaria, tiroide, paratiroide, ghiandola renale, 
pancreas, gonadi); l'effetto degli ormoni più importanti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή ορμονών των ενδοκρινών αδένων (βλεννογόνος 
αδένας, θυροειδής, parathyroid, νεφρικός αδένας, πάγκρεας, 
gonads)  η επίδραση των σημαντικότερων ορμονών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Generación de la hormona de las glándulas de 
endocrina (glándula pituitaria, tiroides, paratiroides, glándula 
renal, páncreas, gónadas); el efecto de las hormonas más 
importantes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">healhty Lebensstil Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation healhty de style de vie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução healhty do lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione healhty di lifestyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">healhty εκπαίδευση τρόπου ζωής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">educación healhty de la forma de vida</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
